ideas.summary: AI-powered study companion for personalized learning
ideas.problem: Students struggle to find study materials tailored to their learning pace and style.
ideas.solution: Build an AI assistant that adapts study content based on student performance and preferences.

ideas.summary: Telemedicine platform for remote patient monitoring
ideas.problem: Rural areas lack access to specialized healthcare services.
ideas.solution: Create a web platform connecting patients with doctors via video calls and real-time health monitoring.

ideas.problem: Supply chains lack transparency leading to counterfeit products and fraud.
ideas.solution: Implement a blockchain network to track products from manufacturing to delivery.

ideas.summary: Campus event management and notification system
ideas.problem: Students miss important campus events due to poor communication channels.
ideas.solution: Develop a mobile-first web app for event creation, discovery, and push notifications.

ideas.problem: Users struggle to remember multiple complex passwords across platforms.
ideas.solution: Build a secure password vault with encryption and biometric login support.
ideas.tech_stack: Python, Flask, SQLite, AES Encryption, JavaScript

ideas.summary: Real-time stock market prediction using machine learning
ideas.problem: Investors need data-driven insights to make informed trading decisions.
ideas.solution: Create a system that analyzes historical data and predicts stock trends using ML models.

ideas.summary: Multiplayer online quiz game with leaderboards
ideas.problem: Students need engaging ways to test their knowledge while competing with peers.
ideas.solution: Develop a real-time quiz game with categories, difficulty levels, and global rankings.

ideas.summary: Text-to-speech accessibility tool for visually impaired users
ideas.problem: Many websites are not accessible to users with visual impairments.
ideas.solution: Create a browser extension that converts web content to natural-sounding speech.
ideas.tech_stack: JavaScript, Web Speech API, Chrome Extension API
